title: Do you know that font?
content: It's familiar to me, but I don't recognize it. Could you please help me?
author: Meriba

comments.content:
It must be **[JournalText](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103165224/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/journal/)** by Zuzana Licko (Emigre, 1990)

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103165224/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
